info.name: Override Translation
info.description:
Override app translation
Available commands:
``` occ l10n-override:add occ l10n-override:list occ l10n-override:delete ```
With this app maybe will be possible change all texts on your Nextcloud. By example changing the "Account name or email" at login screen to "Your code".
To more informations about how this app works or to get examples, look at the admin documentation.
